original_text: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word's sake, immediately they are offended.
korean_text: 그 속에 뿌리가 없어 잠깐 견디다가 말씀으로 인하여 환난이나 박해가 일어나는 때에는 곧 넘어지는 자요

sentences.original_text: And have no root in themselves,
and so endure but for a time:
afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 환난이나 핍박이 일어날 때
